channel.title: Karavel on The Karavel Project

item.title: Community
item.description: We are a community of enthusiasts working together towards improving the cloud-native world, focusing on aspects such as Developer Experience, automation, and ease of use. We do not discriminate, we welcome everyone and anyone with open arms, as long as they share our vision and our values. Any individual willing to participate in the Project must abide by our Code of Conduct. Any unacceptable behaviour will be investigated promptly and fairly.
